name: Work To Do
description:
- Work To Do -

A bitsy game about an experience that we all share at some point.

When you've got work to do but not feeling it, pacing back and forth, checking on random things while still feeling stressed about work.

Enjoy getting trapped in the room, or taking a walk outside.

Use WASD/arrow keys to move & interact

- 10 - 15 mins of play depending on your reading speed & motivation to explore

- 30 objects to interact with

- a switchable lamp

- check the speaker in room to listen to the actual BGM

Tools

Borksy  to add hacks

Image-to-bitsy to convert photos into bitsy room background

Bitsy Muse to control audios

Music

I need to paint my walls - A L E X

So Many Things - Macka.B

Eternal (ft. Kendall Miles & eiiwun.) - Somar/Rainlord./Kendall
